name: The Needlemancer - Demo playground #GodotWildJam27
description:
Short demo written in 4 days for the Godot Wild Jam 27 (theme "Books"). Most of my focus was on visuals and controls. Couldn't manage to put together a proper game due to time constraints (damn work).

Credits

Page flipping sound: https://sonniss.com/gameaudiogdc19/

UI icons: https://www.kenney.nl/

Font: https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Press+Start+2P

Everything else was made by me.
